title: Strengthening Strategic Management Competencies: Fault Diagnosis Skill Acquisition Using Computer-Based Simulation

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding basic system operation principles and problem-solving experience
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for corporate management/HR/administrative staff

learning_goals: Learners can diagnose root causes of system failure symptoms with 80% or higher accuracy in a simulation environment
Learners can successfully apply problem-solving strategies using system principles to three or more real-world cases during the failure diagnosis process
Through random failure-type exercises (HCI conditions), learners can initiate appropriate response procedures within two minutes when new failure types occur

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
